emif.h File Reference

This file contains the prototypes of the APIs present in the device abstraction layer file of EMIF. This also contains some related macros. More...

#include <ti/csl/cslr_emif.h>

Macros

#define EMIF_INTR_STATUS_ALL
 Macro defines mask for all the interrupts status for EMIF.
 
#define EMIF_INTR_ENABLE_ALL
 Macro defines mask for all the interrupts to enable for EMIF.
 
#define EMIF_INTR_DISABLE_ALL
 Macro defines mask for all the interrupts to disable for EMIF.
 
#define EMIF_INTR_ALL   (EMIF_INTR_STATUS_ALL)
 Macro defines mask for all the interrupts for EMIF.
 
#define EMIF_ECC_PROTECTED_NUM_ADDR_RANGE   (0x2)
 Number of ECC Protected Adrress range in EMIF Module.
 
#define EMIF_ECC_FIFO_BUF_SIZE   (0x4U)
 Internal FIFO Buffer with depth of 4 which can store corrected error address or non correctable error address This fifo can store only first 4 error address.To store the 5th error address. Writing 0x1 will pop one element of the FIFO to error address register ,clearing 0th address in FIFO & then we can store next new error addresss in FIFO else will miss the error address log i.e., Overflow occurs when the num ECC Err is more than EMIF_ECC_FIFO_BUF_SIZE.
 
#define EMIF_ECC_ENABLE   (0x1U)
 Macro to Enable EMIF ECC.
 
#define EMIF_ECC_DISABLE   (0x0U)
 Macro to DISABLE EMIF ECC.

Detailed Description

This file contains the prototypes of the APIs present in the device abstraction layer file of EMIF. This also contains some related macros.

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum emifEccAddrRangeNum

Enumerates the values used to represent ECC EMIF protected address ranges.

Enumerator
EMIF_ECC_ADDR_RANGE_NUM_1 

First ECC EMIF protected address range

EMIF_ECC_ADDR_RANGE_NUM_2 

Second ECC EMIF protected address range

enum emifEccAddrRangeType

Enumerates the values used to represent ECC EMIF ECC protected address ranges within/outside defined address range.

Enumerator
EMIF_ECC_ADDR_RANGE_OUTSIDE 

ECC protected address range outside defined address range of EMIF

EMIF_ECC_ADDR_RANGE_WITHIN 

ECC protected address range within defined address range of EMIF

enum emifEccErrType

Enumerates the values used to represent different types of ECC Errors in EMIF Module.

Enumerator
EMIF_ERR_ECC_ONEBIT 

EMIF 1 bit ECC Error

EMIF_ERR_ECC_TWOBIT 

EMIF 2 bit ECC Error

EMIF_ERR_ECC_NONQUANTA 

EMIF ECC Error for When a non-quanta memory/data access

enum emifIntrSrc

Enum for EMIF interrupts.

Enumerator
EMIF_INTR_SRC_CMD_ADDR_ERR 

Command or Address Error interrupt

EMIF_INTR_SRC_WR_ECC_ERR 

Non Quanta aligned Memory access ECC Error interrupt

EMIF_INTR_SRC_TWOBIT_ECC_ERR 

Two Bit ECC Error interrupt

EMIF_INTR_SRC_ONEBIT_ECC_ERR 

One Bit ECC Error interrupt

Function Documentation

void EMIFClearIntrStatus ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
uint32_t  intrMask 
)

This API is used to clear the interrupt status.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the EMIF module Registers.
intrMaskInterrupts to clear status. Refer enum emifIntrSrc_t.
Returns
None.
void EMIFConfigECCClrAllEccErrInfo ( uint32_t  baseAddr)

This function will clear all EMIF ECC error information.

Parameters
baseAddrBase address of EMIF module register
Returns
None
void EMIFConfigECCDisableEcc ( uint32_t  baseAddr)

This function will disable ECC of EMIF Module.

Parameters
baseAddrBase address of EMIF module register
Returns
None
void EMIFConfigECCEnableEcc ( uint32_t  baseAddr)

This function will enable ECC of EMIF Module.

Parameters
baseAddrBase address of EMIF module register
Returns
None
int32_t EMIFConfigECCGetEccErrInfo ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
uint32_t  errType,
emifEccErrInfo_t *  pErrInfo 
)

This function will return the EMIF ECC error information of the defined EMIF ECC Error.

Parameters
baseAddrBase address of EMIF module register
errTypeValue used to represent EMIF ECC Error For valid values refer enum emifEccErrType_t
pErrInfoPointer which hold Error information of the defined EMIF ECC Error For valid values refer enum emifEccErrInfo_t
Returns
STW_SOK on success else STW_EFAIL
int32_t EMIFConfigECCInitECCParams ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
const emifEccCfgPrm_t *  pCfgPrm 
)

This function will intialize the ECC Protected Address range parameters and threshold for 1Bit Error of EMIF Module.

Parameters
baseAddrBase address of EMIF module register
pCfgPrmPointer which holds ECC configuration parameters of EMIF Module
Returns
STW_SOK on success else STW_EFAIL
void EMIFDisableIntr ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
uint32_t  intrMask 
)

This API is used to disable interrupts.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the EMIF module Registers.
intrMaskInterrupts to disable. Refer enum emifIntrSrc_t.
Returns
None.
void EMIFEnableIntr ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
uint32_t  intrMask 
)

This API is used to enable interrupts.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the EMIF module Registers.
intrMaskInterrupts to enable. Refer enum emifIntrSrc_t.
Returns
None.
uint32_t EMIFGetIntrRawStatus ( uint32_t  baseAddr)

This API is used to get the raw interrupt status.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the EMIF module Registers.
Returns
status Pending interrupt status/occurred.
uint32_t EMIFGetIntrStatus ( uint32_t  baseAddr)

This API is used to get the pending interrupts.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the EMIF module Registers.
Returns
status Pending interrupt status/occurred.
